subject: Self Care
title: Measuring Your EQ
description: A fast breakdown of Measuring Your EQ for builders.

hook.text: You can't improve what you can't measure. And most people wildly overestimate their emotional intelligence.

buildup.text: The Mayer-Salovey-Caruso test measures EQ through ability â€” not self-report. It tests actual emotional skill.

discovery.text: Self-report EQ tests are unreliable because people with low EQ lack the awareness to rate themselves accurately.

twist.text: The best informal EQ test is feedback from others. How do people feel after interacting with you regularly?

climax.text: Ask three trusted people to rate your listening, empathy, and composure under stress. Their answers are your score.

punchline.text: Want your real EQ score? Ask the people around you.

quiz.question: Why are self-report EQ tests unreliable?
options: People with low EQ lack awareness to rate themselves accurately
EQ cannot be measured at all
